channel.title: Khan Academy on Mr. Pointing
channel.description: Recent content in Khan Academy on Mr. Pointing

item.title: AP Computer Science Principles - Unit 1
item.description: Unit 1: Digital Information Most of this I should know, being a computer science teacher. However, outlining this should make teaching this rather boring portion easier. I want to try implementing more diagrams while I teach; I’ll be looking forward to stealing their ideas. Bits and bytes How do computers represent data? All computers understand is Binary, 0’s and 1’s. The video explains the example of using one single wire to transfer electricity through it; on or off.
